title: Speakblogger v.1.0 - Android APK
description:
Speakblogger is a global portal with an extensive sound database created by internet users who can upload their files comptletly free of charge. We differ from similar portals (such as one created in February 2005) in as much as a simple fact that we can be followed absolutely anywhere Ã¢â‚¬â€œ while walking, gardening, at the gym, at hime etc. All you need is you ears Ã¢â‚¬â€œ no more.
We belive Speakblogger.com to be a fabulous and revolutionary internet service gathering all audioblogs and sound records in the location!

Blog-isn't enough? Go a step futher, become an audio-blogger!

Speakblogger.com offers a user friendly and innovative interface. We have created a platform, which makes communication around the globe, easier, all because of the audio-blog, or a speak-blog, as we call it. Differently to our competitiors who write short messages comprising of 140 characters since 2006, we audio it!
Audio files added by speakblogger.com users are divided into categories, which makes finding required content easier.

Every logged-in user can add their chosen files to a 'favouritiesÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ folder.
Additionaly, all audio-files can easily be commented on.

Each speakblogger.com user can follow and check other members profiles and access their files, as well as see who is following their blog. There is no limit to the number of your fans!

Add, watch, check out, comment

New sound categories, such as:
Archives Ã¢â‚¬â€œ comprising of records from years ago and recorded on different carriers (M.L. King's speech, Armstrong in space, Edison, Ghandi etc.)
Animal Kingdom Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Where all sounds made by animals are easily accessble even aye-aye has a voice!)
Every sounds Ã¢â‚¬â€œ daily life sounds that always surround us (ambulance sound, sound made by cutlery in use: rain sounds etc.)
Music Ã¢â‚¬â€œ comprehensive guide to music sounds; Dj intros, songs etc.
Each category will be divided into subcategories, depending on needs and content.
